assessment_item.title: 7UQZX7Q10 ________ நோயானது விரைவாக உருவாகி குறுகிய கால நோயாகும்.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

________ நோயானது விரைவாக உருவாகி குறுகிய கால நோயாகும்.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

கடுமையான நோய்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:4129"},{"text":"

நாள்பட்ட நோய்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4130"},{"text":"

குறுகிய கால நோய்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4140"},{"text":"

மறைந்திருக்கின்ற நோய்
